ant_def: Any of the three liberal arts forming the trivium.

def: To render obscure; to darken; to make dim; to keep in the dark; to hide; to make less visible, intelligible, legible, glorious, beautiful, or illustrious.
syn_def: A wandering; a vagary.
ant_def: Full extent; distance between extreme limits; especially; the distance between the nearest surfaces of two bodies, or the space between walls.

def: Able to be done in practice.
syn_def: A possible one.
ant_def: An impossibility
